title: Nira-chan Shuuketsu

synonyms: ABCMART x Zutto Mayonaka de Iinoni.

synopsis:
For the first time in history, the four Nira-chan who appear in the past ZUTOMAYO MVs gathered together in the same world wearing Nike Air Max while listening to the popular song "Obenkyou Shitoite yo" (Study Me). Nira-chan running through with maximum individuality.

(Source: ABCMART Official YouTube Channel, translated)
